about_the_game:
This DLC allows you to fly your simulated models from the dock or the water at a premier floatplane site.

Triple Tree Aerodrome is a 501c3 non-profit organization located in Woodruff, South Carolina. Their sprawling 400-acre facility is a mecca for aviation that’s home to many full-scale and radio-control events, including the world-famous Joe Nall week and Triple Tree Fly-In, as well as year-round educational opportunities within their Aviation Centered Education (ACE) portfolio. This is the float flying site/flight line that accommodates a wide variety of ultra micro to giant scale models.

Whether you choose a floatplane from the water or launch a standard aircraft from the dock, the lake at Triple Tree Aerodrome offers great views in every direction.

This PhotoField uses a spherical photograph of the location, then adds extensive depth-mapping to allow your aircraft to interact with the ground and other objects.
detailed_description:
This DLC allows you to fly your simulated models from the dock or the water at a premier floatplane site.

Triple Tree Aerodrome is a 501c3 non-profit organization located in Woodruff, South Carolina. Their sprawling 400-acre facility is a mecca for aviation that’s home to many full-scale and radio-control events, including the world-famous Joe Nall week and Triple Tree Fly-In, as well as year-round educational opportunities within their Aviation Centered Education (ACE) portfolio. This is the float flying site/flight line that accommodates a wide variety of ultra micro to giant scale models.

Whether you choose a floatplane from the water or launch a standard aircraft from the dock, the lake at Triple Tree Aerodrome offers great views in every direction.

This PhotoField uses a spherical photograph of the location, then adds extensive depth-mapping to allow your aircraft to interact with the ground and other objects.
